channel.title: Port Forwarding and No-ip hosting
channel.description:
This is it, my server is 100% Done, I just need to host it!
*Problem* Problem= I cant host it because my router isnt in the List at PortForward.com (or something like that) Router= Speedport W501v Host=No-ip.biz Country=Germany, if that helps... ^^no negative comments on my English please!^^
*Solutions* 1st. A way I find out how to PortForward. 2nd. I get a second router (Somone told me, i dont get what this is supposed to do) 3rd. Someone tells me a different solution XD 4th. I use hamachi (No clue how it works), and its kinda stupid to be honest =/ 5th. Someone I can trust host's this for me 6th. I heard I can host a server over a Website I do not know how to do this, and it would be best if it was free, somone plz respond to this.
*Notes* -I DO know how to host it, i jsut dont know how to PortForward it because there is none for my on Portforward.com or something like that.
-I got an DSL Internet flatrate from -T---COM also known as Telekom
-Any other Information you need: JUST ASK!
-Rewards will only be given when the server is online!
-Router=Speedport W501v
*Rewards* If you helped you will recieve in Turn
-Mod or Adminship on my server -Runescape Gp if it has to be =( -The source I made

item.title: Port Forwarding and No-ip hosting
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

lol not many people rep, and erm, you cant no-ip?
Mod taharok has a guide have you read it?
its on his tutorial guide.
+
Portforwarding = changing port?
go to server at bottom of your folder and click ctrl +f
and search for :
public static int serverlistenerPort =
then change to w/e you want.
Hope i help - Mopar Helper =)

Read full topic
